title: Perrier® Carbonated Mineral Water | Perrier International
snippet: Perrier is a sugar-free and calorie-free tasty carbonated mineral water. Perrier has different flavors: Original, Lemon, Lime, Pink Grapefruit, Green Apple et L’Orange.

title: Perrier Drinks: Refreshing Taste and Bold Bubbles
snippet: Perrier drinks – natural mineral sparkling water for any occasion. Refresh your senses with the pure taste of Perrier. Try it today.

title: Perrier® Acqua Minerale Frizzante | Perrier Italia
snippet: Perrier è un'acqua minerale frizzante, icona di stile ed eleganza, straordinariamente rinfrescante e dissetante, senza zucchero e con zero calorie. Scopri Perrier Italia

title: PERRIER®, une eau gazeuse minérale et extraordinaire | PERRIER® France
snippet: Découvrez l'eau gazeuse naturelle PERRIER®, ses recettes de cocktail à base d'eau pétillante, son actualité et ses produits extraordinaires.

title: Perrier Original: l'iconica acqua frizzante | Perrier Italia
snippet: Elegante, effervescente, rinfrescante: una combinazione unica di bollicine ed equilibrato contenuto di sali minerali. Scopri l'iconica acqua frizzante Perrier.
